attributes.action: remove all green taxes from fuel and air travel
attributes.additional_details: to have all green taxes removed from fuel and air travel. This will cut overall costs to the manufacturers and consumers and will in the long term boost the economy and make it possible for the poor and downtrodden to actually afford to drive and fly again. As the junk science behind the church of climatology is being exposed more and more for the sham it is it is time that this government stopped penalising the country for affects that man has no control over.,
